I can't judge this game by it's shortnes, (can be finished in 2h) because it was made by 6 students in less than 2 years. Portal game mechanics are cool af. Even though Portal is almost (they both are placed in the same universe) completely different from Half Life 2, it feels more like a mod for Half Life 2. It is definitely worth buying when it's on sale because then it costs only 1 eur. I totally recommend buying this game. 9/10
The game may be 11 years old, a classic that any other gamer has to play at least once

Please do yourself a favor and don't make the mistake that I did by playing Portal 2 before playing this game. It somewhat ruined the experience for me, but I still enjoyed it a lot. Everything about Portal is perfect, with my only criticism being that it's too short.

[h1][b]Portal.[/b][/h1]

[h1]Resumen:[/h1]

Tanto Portal como Portal 2 [b]no son sólo juegos de portales[/b].
Se destacan por sus [b]magníficas historias y un villano excelente[/b], metiéndote completamente en el drama y queriendo pasar todos los niveles con ansias. Cada nivel es un [i]arcade[/i] completamente nuevo que requerirá de toda tu [b]capacidad intelectual[/b] para superarlo. Por suerte y para ello, contaremos con una pistola de portales con los cuales tendremos que hacer todo lo que se nos ocurra para llegar hasta la salida.

[h1]En profundidad:[/h1]

Para jugar al segundo no hace falta jugar al primero, para disfrutar su historia sí.
Seremos una “rata de laboratorio humana” y nos usarán para hacer sus pruebas dentro de una [b]organización futurista[/b]. Al final, un giro inesperado cambia la situación y habrá que sobrevivir como se pueda.
Jugarlo en modo cooperativo también será una posibilidad (fuera de la historia del juego) que indudablemente tendrás que probar si decides comprar el juego, ya que ofrece nuevos niveles y diversión multiplicada, requiriendo estos de cuatro portales para ser pasados (en su mayoría).

[h1]Valoración:[/h1]

Si te gustan los juegos de lógica, [i]arcade[/i], pensar y [b]resolver problemas[/b], este juego te va a encantar. Si bien la calidad gráfica es excelente, no requiere de la más actual computadora para ser jugado con fluidez.

[quote=Kruwps]Mi puntuación final (teniendo en cuenta: imagen, jugabilidad, optimización, historia, objetivo, contenido, horas jugables): [u]75/100[/u].[/quote]

Un buen juego para pasar el rato. Me he pasado el juego como en 2h ( aunque lo haya jugado poco , me ha encantado).
Recomendado 10/10

Cara, na boa, para de ler as análises e compra logo essa perfeição que chamamos de portal <3.

刚开始以为只是个普通的解密游戏，心里还奇怪没评论里说的那么神啊，直到有一关我在一面墙的后面发现了一些涂鸦[spoiler]“The cake is a lie” [/spoiler]
我觉得很奇怪，之后的关卡总是能在一些门，墙壁，通风管道后面发现类似的涂鸦，似乎是在暗示着什么。终于，这一切都在19关揭晓了[spoiler]当Glados将你推向焚化炉，你逃离后千方百计地想将你骗回来，最终和Glados决战时，一切的谜团都揭开了 [/spoiler]
10/10，主线流程三个小时左右，当你凭自己的智商玩通了这个游戏后你会感受到前所未有的成就感——你没有杀掉任何人，你只是通关了，就这么简单。Glados又腹黑又可爱，言语间充满着讽刺和另类的幽默，况且最后还能听Glados唱歌，有什么理由不推荐呢？[strike] 有兴趣的可以玩一玩开发者注释模式 [/strike]
exelente jogo
几小时下来不禁感叹这竟然是11年前的游戏，游戏性和创意在如今也有借鉴的意义，这次夏促入手真是正确的决定。如果你没有玩过传送门，我强烈建议你入手体验一下这款解谜、剧情游戏中的天花板。
Игра очень классная и короткая. В детстве я не мог ее полностью пройти из-за ее сложности, да и сейчас я юзал ноуклип (чтоб время сэкономить), но несмотря на это 7/10

I cannot think of one negative thing to say about this game.  The story is amazing and funny, the game play is spot on, I have not seen or even heard of any bugs or glitches that make it unplayable and the difficulty is exactly where it needs to be.

10/10.  This is a classic and if you have somehow not played it do so immediately.

Pros: 
- Interesting story and atmosphere
- Very fun gameplay and entertaining puzzles, utilising portals, turrets and energy ball challenges in clever and creative ways
- Challenging bonus levels that have more advanced challenges for skilled players

Cons:
- The main game is quite short (Took me roughly 3 hours to beat the main game and about an hour for the advanced levels [have not yet finished the level challenges])
- Some occasional freezes and stutters

Overall, highly recommended!

갓겜이 괜히 갓겜이 아니네요. 몇몇 레벨은 조금 난이도가 있지만 혼자서 해결을 못해서 공략을 봐야할 정도의 난이도는 아닙니다. 도전실험실 금메달은 몇몇 레벨은 정말 따기 힘들더라구요. 찾아보니까 버그를 써도 빡빡하던데 뭐 버그를 안써도 깰 수는 있겠지만 엄두가 안나더라구요. 특히 최소 걸음은 굉장히 극혐입니다. 아무튼 재미있고 이제 포탈 2를 하러 가야겠습니다.

맞다, 한 가지 깜빡했는데 하다보면 좀 멀미가 납니다.

Oh my god.

It is so amazing, I cannot even begin to describe it. The concept is amazing, and the way that the idea is executed is even better. 5 hours of challenging puzzles, with a pretty funny story to accompany it, and to wrap it all up, you could run it on a potato. Graphics are okay, but it was released in 2007, so, what do you expect.

Get it.

Immmediately.

An almost perfect game. Right when you start to get a little bored, it shakes things up, and ends perfectly. A game that makes you think, and although the story is short, it's definatly worth the dollar I put into it. A must have for your library, and c'mon, it's a dollar right now, might as well if for some reason you still haven't played it.
